description: Image snapshots fail to upload to glance correctly. Looks like we need to add the glance 'v1' API version to the upload URL.
title: Xen image snapshot upload failure (glance 'v1' support)

comments.content: Image snapshots fail to upload to glance correctly. Looks like we need to add the glance 'v1' API version to the upload URL.
